page.title: 09 Economics
page.content:
West Glamorgan County Council have built several factory units on the industrial site. One of these units is occupied by Gower Produce Ltd a firm which distributes the fruit and vegetables which are grown in the area. One half of another unit is occupied by Manderwood Engineering firm which makes roofing timbers. Between these two factories only 17 people are employed.The other factory has never been used.Other factory units are being built by the Council. A Survey We Carried Out How many people work there? MEN WOMEN MANDERWOOD ENGINEERING 4 0 GOWER PRODUCE LTD 13 0
How far away do they live? -5m +5m MANDERWOOD ENGINEERING 4 0 GOWER PRODUCE LTD 13 0
